main event: On 4 August 1965, a civilian observed a silver ball of light with a long vapor trail in Sacramento, California.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5-6 minutes.,The object was at an estimated altitude of 5,000-6,000 feet.,The sighting occurred from the lobby of the 605 K St. Claire Hotel.,Witness description indicates that the object was the size of a dime and emitted an intense light.,The observation was made in clear skies with a slight wind.
witness description: Civilian male, 27 years of age, observed from hotel lobby
